values.value: SELECT Id, Name, Industry, AnnualRevenue, Type, NumberOfEmployees FROM Account WHERE Industry IN :industries AND Type != :excludedType AND AnnualRevenue >= :minRevenue AND (Name LIKE :namePattern OR Industry LIKE :industryPattern) AND NumberOfEmployees BETWEEN :minEmployees AND :maxEmployees AND BillingCountry NOT IN :excludedCountries ORDER BY AnnualRevenue DESC
